pages.title: Related Entries
pages.text: The following entries are related to Nature Essence Ritual and the Essence Coating Ritual.

pages.title: What Are Coatings?
pages.text: Essence Coatings are alchemical liquids that empower your weapons with various effects.$(br)They are acquired through a special Cauldron Ritual.

pages.title: Effects & Usage
pages.text: - Each Essence Coating provides a unique bonus to your weapon.$(br)- Bonuses range from boosting damage against specific mobs to granting special abilities.$(br)$(br)Infuse your weapon with an Essence Coating using an Anvil.

pages.title: Limitations
pages.text: - Only *one coating* can be active on a weapon at any given time.$(br)- Applying a new coating will overwrite the previous one.$(br)- Coatings only work on melee weapons (swords, axes, etc.).
Keep an eye on your weapon's coating lifetime! It will wear off over time.
